title: Help me Climb Ranked
body: I have put +30 hours into league every week and i have climbed from bronze 5 in early December gold. I have being up and down in gold for the longest time now and I losing motivation to continue to play rank league games. Does anyone know and good links that can help me understand this game better.

replies.body: Ok first things first what are your mains because I looked at you op.gg and I was confused as hell at what I saw
my best champ is akali but nasus and cho are my other picks for solo/duo ranked

Im not in gold but maybe play a solo or flex game and play full try-hard and go look at the replay and write down what you have done well and what need to be work on and go on youtube and search what you can do about the cons.

But im not in gold so yeah- don't know if it helps.
